title: How to start research for dissertation - Quora

response.answer_text: The best way to start research is to read more and more about the topic or area you are interested in. You should read all the material available books, Research papers, patents and all other materials, which will give you idea regarding the research gap where you can work on. Also make sure that your guide or supervisor is in agreement with the topic chosen, please seak his advice about your topic before commencing.
